strategic_overview.purpose: Support HR and leadership in conducting structured annual performance reviews with trackable employee evaluations and follow-up goals.
business_value: Ensures compliance with corporate evaluation processes
Provides leadership with data to support promotions or training plans
Allows HR to document improvement plans and actions

mvp_components.app_details: A model-driven app to manage the performance review process including forms for self and manager input, tracking review status, and reporting compliance.

app_screens.screen_details: Structured performance review form that allows input from both the employee and their manager.

features.entity_forms: Customizable forms to capture performance review data, including sections for self-assessment and manager input.
features.form_business_rules: Rules to ensure form fields are filled out according to the evaluation process and to enforce read-only status after final submission.
features.security_roles: Configured roles to control access permissions for employees, managers, and HR reviewers according to the hierarchical reporting structure.
features.workflows: Automated multi-step workflows to manage the review cycle from draft to review to confirmation.
features.views: Custom views to track review status by employee and department, and to identify overdue evaluations.
features.charts: Visual charts to support company-wide reporting on the performance review process.
features.auditing: Track changes to review records to maintain a history of manager feedback and other updates.
features.record_associations: Relationships between performance review records and employee profiles to add manager feedback history.

app_screens.screen_details: Tracks the status of reviews by employee and department, indicating who is overdue.

features.entity: Custom entity to store review status data with fields for employee, department, review status, and due dates.
features.views: Custom views to display review status by employee and department, including filters for overdue reviews.
features.security_roles: employee_role: Read access to own review status and ability to confirm evaluations and add self-assessment., manager_role: Read and write access to performance reviews for direct reports., hr_reviewer_role: Read and write access to all review statuses to monitor review cycles and track documentation.
features.business_rules: To enforce read-only access on review records after final submission.
features.workflows: To support the multi-step review process: draft, review, and confirm stages.
features.hierarchical_security_model: To ensure access follows the hierarchical reporting structure.
features.dashboards: To provide HR and leadership with an overview of the review process compliance and overdue reviews.
features.charts: To visualize data related to review status and compliance within dashboards.

app_screens.screen_details: Reports on the compliance of the review process across the company.

features.views: Custom views to display compliance data such as 'Reviews Due', 'Overdue Reviews', and 'Completed Reviews'.
features.charts: Visual representations of compliance data, like pie charts or bar graphs showing the percentage of completed vs. pending reviews.
features.dashboards: A dashboard to aggregate the views and charts for a comprehensive compliance report.
features.security_roles: Configured security roles to ensure that only HR Reviewers have access to monitor and track the compliance data.
features.business_rules: Rules to enforce that review records become read-only after final submission.
features.workflows: Automated workflows to notify HR and leadership about overdue reviews and to manage the multi-step review process.
features.reporting_features: Built-in reporting tools to generate company-wide compliance reports, which can be filtered by department or other criteria.

post_mvp_modules.details: Allows managers and employees to create and track individual development goals, integrated with the internal Learning Management System (LMS).
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the ModelDrivenApp to include a new screen for managing development goals, leveraging the existing data model and ensuring a seamless user experience.

post_mvp_modules.details: Adds a historical view of manager feedback to the employee profiles, allowing for better tracking of performance over time.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Incorporate a feedback history screen into the ModelDrivenApp to provide context for performance reviews and support informed decision-making.

permissions: Submit and edit performance reviews for reports
Monitor review cycles and track documentation

constraints: Access must follow hierarchical reporting structure
Review records must be read-only after final submission
integration_points: Integration with internal LMS for development goals

fields.name: manager_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the employee's manager

fields.name: review_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for each performance review

fields.name: employee_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the employee being reviewed

fields.name: review_status
fields.description: Current status of the review (draft, review, confirmed)

tables.description: Stores information about all performance reviews

fields.name: employee_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the employee the goal is assigned to

fields.name: due_date
fields.description: Date by which the goal should be achieved

tables.description: Stores information about all goals set during performance reviews

database_model.notes: The Employees table is related to the Performance_Reviews table through the employee_id field, which is a foreign key in the Performance_Reviews table. This relationship allows us to track all reviews for a particular employee. Similarly, the Employees table is related to the Goals table through the employee_id field, allowing us to track all goals for a particular employee. The manager_id field in the Employees table is a self-referencing foreign key, allowing us to establish a hierarchical reporting structure.
